WITHER.DESCRIPTION: Permanently decrease this card's power by the wither amount. When it reaches #b0, the card becomes #yDepleted. Can be replenished at Rest Sites.

ENTANGLED.DESCRIPTION: You cannot play #yAttack cards for one turn.

BLEED.DESCRIPTION: Bleeding creatures take damage at the end of their turn. Bleed does not decrease over time.

PLATED_ARMOR_BEAKED.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces #yPlated #yArmor by #b1.
